name: Pasta Pomodoro
description: When it comes to pasta we want something simple and fast. Pasta Pomodoro is a step above from spaghetti and meatballs and highlights the freshness of tomatoes — pomodoro means 'tomato' in Italian. You're cooking down the tomatoes just enough to form a light sauce but keeping most of them intact. It's the freshest pasta and is best enjoyed outside with a mound of grated Parmesan.
